thread.title: Michael Stearns
thread.title_full: RC Planet reviewed by Michael Stearns

author: Michael Stearns
title: Michael Stearns
text: Extremely disappointed that I paid for faster shipping and my order didn't even ship for 3 days after the order date. The higher shipping cost was a waste of my money. I contacted your company and was just told sorry that is how it works sometimes. I just decided to find a new company to do business with.
